```{r }
# Install and load required packages
install.packages("rvest")
install.packages("httr")
install.packages("polite")
```

```{r}

library(rvest)
library(httr)
library(polite)
```

```{r}
# Set up polite scraper
polite::use_manners(save_as = 'polite_scrape.R')
```

```{r}
# Define the URL template
pfurl_template <- 'https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0110912/reviews/_ajax?ref_=undefined&paginationKey=%s'
```

```{r}
# Initialize vectors
pfUsernames <- character(0)
pfReviewerDates <- character(0)
pfReviewerContents <- character(0)
pfRatings <- character(0)
```

```{r}
# Scrape data from multiple pages
reviews_to_scrape <- 300
pagination_key <- ""
for (page in 1:ceiling(reviews_to_scrape / 25)) {
  session <- bow(sprintf(pfurl_template, pagination_key), user_agent = "Educational")
  
  # Scrape data
  pfUsernames <- c(pfUsernames, scrape(session) %>% html_nodes('span.display-name-link') %>% html_text())
  pfReviewerDates <- c(pfReviewerDates, scrape(session) %>% html_nodes('span.review-date') %>% html_text())
  pfReviewerContents <- c(pfReviewerContents, scrape(session) %>% html_nodes('div.text.show-more__control') %>% html_text())
  pfRatings <- c(pfRatings, scrape(session) %>% html_nodes('span.rating-other-user-rating') %>% html_text())
  
  # Extract pagination key for the next page
  pagination_key <- scrape(session) %>% html_nodes("div.load-more-data") %>% html_attr("data-key")
  
  # Check if we have reached the desired number of reviews
  if (length(pfUsernames) >= reviews_to_scrape) {
    break
  }
}
```

```{r}
# Create a data frame
pfDataFrame <- data.frame(
  pfUsernames = pfUsernames[1:300],
  pfReviewer_Date = pfReviewerDates[1:300],
  pfReviewer_Content = pfReviewerContents[1:300],
  pfRating = pfRatings[1:300]
)
```

```{r}
# Save as CSV
write.csv(pfDataFrame, file = "PulpFiction_reviews.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
# Print the data frame
print(pfDataFrame)
```
